meeting_info.organization: Dallas City Council Workforce, Education, and Equity Committee
meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of the January 8, 2024, Workforce, Education, and Equity Committee Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Dallas Housing Policy 2033 Implementation Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the implementation of the Dallas Housing Policy 2033.

agenda_items.title: Update on Digital Navigators Program (High Speed Internet Access in Dallas)
agenda_items.description: Update on the Digital Navigators Program aimed at improving high-speed internet access.

agenda_items.title: Period Access Dallas (PAD)/ American Rescue Plan (ARPA) Essential Necessities Cooperation Agreement with Staples
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the cooperation agreement with Staples regarding essential necessities.

agenda_items.title: College Advisory Commission Update Regarding Appointments and Recruitment Efforts and Civic Analysis Project
agenda_items.description: Update on the College Advisory Commission's appointments and recruitment efforts.

agenda_items.title: Update on a Proposed Human Rights Commission and Updates Concerning the Veteran Affairs Commission and Commission on Disabilities
agenda_items.description: Updates on the proposed Human Rights Commission and other commissions.
